entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Otherwise sunny. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
